about_the_game:
Winter Holidays Book

This seasonal book unlocks 20 additional levels for Coloring Pixels!

Contents

The Winter Holidays book unlocks the following images:
  • Snowman - 15x16
  • Santa - 47x24
  • Gift - 48x50
  • Tree - 46x85
  • Turkey - 57x40
  • Hearth - 67x78
  • Menorah - 79x98
  • Elf - 91x106
  • Delivery - 93x66
  • Angel - 93x73
  • Snowflake - 99x99
  • Snowglobe - 100x100
  • Firework - 100x105
  • Candy Canes - 110x34
  • Bauble - 110x123
  • North Pole - 130x130
  • Reindeer - 165x44
  • Gingerbread House - 180x166
  • Wreath - 197x199
  • Winter Wonderland - 320x180

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.11
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX960
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 7700k
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX970
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

short_description: Unlocks the Winter Holidays themed book for Coloring Pixels. Includes 20 new winter holiday themed levels to complete! Expect images of gifts, snowmen, and Reindeer!
